title: Bug 21706 - BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
description: Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
OB: The org.eclipse.swt.internal.BidiUtil class in win32 uses the Class.forName() method.
EB: The org.eclipse.swt.internal.BidiUtil class in win32 should not use the Class.forName() method and should find an alternative solution to instantiate the Callback class.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Compile and run the code on a CLDC version of SWT.
2. Observe that a NoClassDefFoundError is thrown due to the usage of Class.forName() method in the BidiUtil class.
3. The issue can be verified or replicated using jxeLink or a similar tool for the compiler.
